source: TEXT_LUCKYB007_03842_WEAPONSGIENGINEER_000_001<tab>I have to say, that was a most exhilarating battle! I never dreamed that I would have the chance to see such a ferocious warmachina with my own eyes!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB007_03842_WEAPONSGIENGINEER_000_001これはこれは、)) (( )) 02 /var>君！
「ウェポン」との戦い、物陰より見守っていたぞ！

source: TEXT_LUCKYB007_03842_WEAPONSGIENGINEER_000_002<tab>You might find it odd that a citizen of Eorzea would be so excited by something sent by the Garleans to slaughter us in our thousands, but as an avid follower of all things gigantic and mechanical, I just can't help myself!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB007_03842_WEAPONSGIENGINEER_000_002それにしても、まさか帝国軍が、
アルテマウェポンの後継機の開発に成功するとは……

source: TEXT_LUCKYB007_03842_WEAPONSGIENGINEER_000_003<tab>Oh, to be able to pilot such a majestic creation... Perhaps I should defect to the Empire and offer my services. Ahem! Ever since the time of the original Ultima Weapon, I have fallen in love with this fusion of Allagan and Garlean design. It takes my breath away!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB007_03842_WEAPONSGIENGINEER_000_003嗚呼、その情報を知った時、どれだけ私が興奮したかわかるかい？
いやこれは聞くまでもない愚問だ、絶対にわかるはずがないからね。
アラグ帝国の生み出した蛮神兵器を、現代に蘇らせたばかりか……

source: TEXT_LUCKYB007_03842_WEAPONSGIENGINEER_000_004<tab>So much so, that I used my spare moments at the Ironworks to develop a line of miniatures! And now, your recently vanquished foe shall be the inspiration for my next endeavor. Would you do me the honor of casting your gaze across the piece once it is complete?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB007_03842_WEAPONSGIENGINEER_000_004最新の魔導技術によって後継機種を開発してしまっただなんて、
信じられるかい？　いいや信じられるはずがないまさに脅威だよね！
そう脅威さ、そして驚異でもある、あ、これは駄洒落じゃないよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYB007_03842_A1_000_001<tab>If that's what it takes to shut you up.
TEXT_LUCKYB007_03842_A1_000_002<tab>Don't blame me if I smash it to smithereens.

TEXT_LUCKYB007_03842_WEAPONSGIENGINEER_000_007<tab>Hmm? Did you say something? Whatever it was, I'm sure you were offering heartfelt words of encouragement! It's the support of fans such as yourself that make this such a worthwhile hobby.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB007_03842_WEAPONSGIENGINEER_000_007おっと失敬……つい興奮してしまってね。
こう見えて私は、ガーロンド・アイアンワークス社に在籍する、
模型の原型師でね……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYB007_03842_WEAPONSGIENGINEER_000_009<tab>I'm proud to say my work adorns the homes of many like-minded machina lovers. The Ultima Weapon and magitek reaper miniatures, to name but two of my creations, are especially popular.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB007_03842_WEAPONSGIENGINEER_000_009「RGアルテマウェポン」や「MG魔導リーパー」が代表作さ。
君が撃破した「ウェポン」についても、
模型化を進めているんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYB007_03842_WEAPONSGIENGINEER_100_009<tab>Of course, I wouldn't be much of an engineer if I only made inanimate ornaments!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB007_03842_WEAPONSGIENGINEER_100_009模型など眺めて何が面白いのか、と思うか？
フヒヒ……私が造ろうとしているのは、ただの模型ではないのだよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKYB007_03842_WEAPONSGIENGINEER_200_010<tab>Behold! I have restored this Allagan relic, added a few flourishes of my own, and dubbed it the Real Virtuality Combat Simulation Experiencinator!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB007_03842_WEAPONSGIENGINEER_200_010これは、古代アラグ文明の遺物を改造せし装置……
その名も「模擬戦システム」！

source: TEXT_LUCKYB007_03842_WEAPONSGIENGINEER_300_010<tab>By feeding it various pieces of data, such as images of my replicas and so on, it is able to recreate a range of combat scenarios. For research purposes, of course. Not entertainment, oh no!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB007_03842_WEAPONSGIENGINEER_300_010私が造り上げた模型をスキャンし、
より一層激しい、「ウェポン」との戦闘を仮想体験させてくれるのだ！
どういう原理かはわからないが、アラグ文明ってすごい！

source: TEXT_LUCKYB007_03842_WEAPONSGIENGINEER_400_010<tab>I can see you're practically champing at the bit to give it a try. There's no stopping you intrepid adventurer types!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB007_03842_WEAPONSGIENGINEER_400_010どうだ、興奮してきただろう？
君だって、いますぐに戦いたいに決まっている。
冒険者なら、ファイターなら！

source: TEXT_LUCKYB007_03842_WEAPONSGIENGINEER_000_010<tab>It won't be long until my latest work is complete. All that remains are one or two final adjustments, so don't go anywhere!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB007_03842_WEAPONSGIENGINEER_000_010それでは、もし時間があるなら、改めて声をかけてほしい。
私の新作模型のあんなところやこんなところまで、
たっぷりとご覧に入れよう……フヒヒ。
